nodes.text: Frogs were croaking amphibians that could be found on the planets Rodia and Tinnel IV. Klatooine paddy frogs were a type of frogs. The gwerps were similar to frogs in some respects. The large and predatory oggdo species, native to Bogano, had features extremely similar to frogs.[source?]

Upon meeting Jedi Master Yoda—a diminutive green humanoid of an unknown species—a child of the Mud dwellers believed him to be a frog. Later in galactic history, Luke Skywalker compared Yoda to a frog when he met the Jedi Master on Dagobah.
